text: Peter Schmidhuber (15 December 1931 - 26 December 2020) was a German politician. He was a member of the CSU party. Schmidhuber was born in Munich. He was a member of the Munich city council from 1960 to 1966. From 1965 to 1969 and again from 1972 to 1978, he was a member of the Bundestag. Schmidhuber also held many political posts in the European Union during the Jacques Delors commission. Schmidhuber died on 26 December 2020 in Munich at the age of 89.Peter Schmidhuber im Alter von 89Â‰Jahren gestorben ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:European Union politicians Category:Politicians from Munich
title: Peter Schmidhuber
